ErrorCodes.Meaning: No such file or directory (returned by the FS module indirectly)
Invalid public key type in certificate

ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: Re-launch your wad manager or try another wad
Re-launch your wad manager or try another wad

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Maximum amount of handles exceeded (3 handles, as there are only 3 contexts)
Device ID mismatch. Returned by ES_ImportTicket if the ticket is personalised and the device ID from the ticket mismatches with the actual ID.
ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: Wad isnt fake signed and you are trying to install a wad dumped from another console

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Imported content hash does not match with the hash from the TMD. Returned by ES_ImportContentEnd and ES_ImportBoot.

ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: Re-start your wad manager or try another wad manager

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Incorrect access rights (according to the TMD)
ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: Try reloading with ios58 with AHBPROT or a cios

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Issuer not found in the certificate chain

Invalid ticket. This is returned if the common key field contains an invalid value (anything other than 0 or 1). This is also returned from ES_LaunchTitle if the title ID contained in the ticket does not match the TMD title ID.

During LaunchTitle/ImportTitle: installed boot2 version is too old.
During ImportBoot: downgrades are not allowed.
ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: Why are you trying to downgrade boot2? Stop.

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Fatal error early in ES initialisation. Can also be returned in ES_CheckHasKoreanKey in some cases.
A ticket limit was exceeded (duration or launch count)
Returned in ES_CheckHasKoreanKey in some cases.
A title with a higher version is already installed
ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: uninstall existing version or install a higher version wad

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Required sysversion(IOS) is not installed (only for the system menu)
ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: Dont install another system menu. theres no need for it.

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Installed number of contents doesn't match TMD (only for the system menu)
Returned by DI as an ES error code when "TMD not supplied for disc/nand game"
Permission denied (returned when accessing an object for which the caller has no permission)
ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: reload using ios58 with AHBPROT or a cIOS

ErrorCodes.Meaning:
IOSC_FAIL_CHECKVALUE
Known to be returned when a signature check failed.
ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: Usually this is fixed by loading an IOS with AHBPROT(ios58) or using cIOS249

ErrorCodes.Meaning: Memory allocation failure. Known to be returned when the keyring is full (contains 0x20 keys)

ErrorCodes.SuggestedFix: the wad is larger than the NAND
Install cios249, use a different wad manager, restart your console
